mapper.insert: insert into swarm_user_config (configid, userid, isowner, rights) values (#{configid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isowner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rights,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into swarm_user_config
configid,
userid,
isowner,
rights,
#{configid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isowner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rights,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select a.userid,a.username,a.account,a.email,a.telephone,a.weixin,a.role,a.status,b.configid as id,b.rights,b.isowner from swarm_user_config b,swarm_userinfo a where a.userid = b.userid and configid = #{configid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
